document.masterDocTitle: A Checklist of the Aspidogastrea (Platyhelminthes: Trematoda) of the World

subSubSection.paragraph:
[Syns.
A . ringens
Linton, 1905
;
Cotylogaster chaetodipteri
MacCallum, 1921
]

Calamus bajonado
(Actinopterygii); marine; intestine; NAO; Bahamas , USA (North America ) ( Manter

Remark: Described by
MacCallum ( 1921 )
as
C . chaetodipteri
.

Crassostrea tulipa
(Bivalvia); brackish, marine; unspecified site of infection; NAO; Guinea (Africa)

Remark: Dubious parasite identification for
Gibson et al . ( 2005 )
.

Remark: Immature specimens;
L . ringens
probably requires a vertebrate host to complete its life cycle, as in
L . jungwirthi
and
L . manteri
(Rohde 1973 ; Zylber & Ostrowski de
Núñez 1999
).

(Actinopterygii); marine; intestine; NAO; British Overseas Territory (North America )
